name: Thermometer for Adults and Kids, Fast Accurate Baby Thermometer, FSA HSA Eligible, Fever Alarm & Mute Mode, Baby Essentials - Lifetime Support

other_info.Display Type: 1* Thermometer, 2* AAA Battery, 1* Pouch, Instruction Manual, Quick Start Guide

about_this_item: Fast & Accurate - Discover the precision of our forehead thermometer. Engineered to deliver highly accurate temperature measurements, our professional-grade device offers a user-friendly experience. With a non-contact design, it ensures hygienic usage and provides fast results within seconds. Suitable for all ages, it is a must-have for households and medical professionals alike. Rely on our brand's commitment to accuracy and obtain the peace of mind you deserve.

COLOR CODED TEMPERATURE GUIDANCE: Viproud baby thermometer comes with color-coded buttons to indicate different temperature levels, along with one or three soft beeps to give you an instant visual indication of whether your temperature is normal or not.

EASY TO USE & READ: This digital thermometer features an extra clear and large LED display, making it easy to read the temperature even in dimly lit rooms or at night. Simply hold the thermometer near the forehead, press the button, and within 1 second, the temperature reading will be displayed on the large LED screen.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS: Viproud infrared thermometer has a dual-mode forehead and object function that can measure the temperature of forehead, room and food; 35 sets of memory storage; one-touch mute; ℉/℃ switchable; 30 seconds auto shut-off function, which is designed for the whole family.

COMFORTABLE TO HOLD & EASY TO CARRY: With its ergonomic and lightweight design, our thermometer fits comfortably in your hand, ensuring ease of use for both adults and kids. Furthermore, its compact size makes it ideal for travel or on-the-go use. You can carry it conveniently in your bag or pocket, ensuring you are always ready to monitor your temperature whenever needed.

title: Verified Purchase
content: Bought this to replace an under-the-tongue digital thermometer that always seemed to read low. Yes, a number of factors go into using these scanners but it seems like we get such a wide range of temp readings depending on where we scan. I don’t feel like a single reading is actually accurate so we scan multiple areas of the face/neck and basically go with an average of all the readings. I am a health care professional so I’m no stranger to these scanners but even I question their accuracy. They are quick and easy though, and we enjoy that it beeps and flashes differently when a higher temp is displayed. It’s quick and easy, just not sure how accurate.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2024
